<[SOSM]>
قربان دل شوم که به مردانگی کشید
<[EOSM]>
<[EOT]>
<[SOT]>
<[SOFM]>
کی نشئهٔ صهبا، دل غمناک گشاید؟
<[EOFM]>
<[SOSM]>
می چون نتواند گره تاک گشاید
<[EOSM]>
<[SOFM]>
کار جگر سنگ، سپرداری دل نیست
<[EOFM]>
<[SOSM]>

<[EOSM]>
<[EOT]>
<[SOT]>
<[SOFM]>

<[SOSM]>

<[EOSM]>
<[SOFM]>

<[EOFM]>
<[SOSM]>

<[EOSM]>
<[SOFM]>

<[EOFM]>
<[SOSM]>

<[EOSM]>
<[EOT]>
<[SOT]>
<[SOFM]>

<[EOFM]>
<[SOSM]>

<[EOSM]>
<[SOFM]>

<[EOFM]>
<[SOSM]>

<[EOSM]>
<[EOT]>
<[SOT]>
<[SOFM]>

<[EOSM]>
<[SOFM]>

<[EOFM]>

<[EOSM]>
<[EOT]>
<[SOT]>

<[EOSM]>
<[EOT]>
<[SOT]>

<[EOFM]>

<[EOSM]>
<[SOFM]>

<[EOFM]>

<[EOSM]>

<[EOSM]>

<[SOSM]>

<[EOFM]>
<[SOSM]>

<[SOSM]>
چو ابر سیه دل، ببارید زار
<[EOSM]>
<[SOFM]>

<[EOFM]>
<[SOSM]>

<[SOFM]>

<[SOSM]>

<[SOFM]>

<[SOFM]>

<[SOSM]>

<[EOT]>

<[EOFM]>

<[SOSM]>

<[SOFM]>

<[SOSM]>

<[SOFM]>

<[SOSM]>

<[SOFM]>

<[EOFM]>
<[SOSM]>

<[SOFM]>
